_header: To my lady dear I must me now incline
Subjects: lovers, addresses to beloved; lovers’ plea
_description: Lover’s apology to his lady — fragment of four lines, rhyming abac?

PULTayM5.Transcription:
o my lady dere I muste me nowe inclineAnd to hyr comely corse me to
                    redresseffor many such causes [ ]seth to [ ]yne[ ] for to foolysh men
                    that [ ]…
PULTayM5.Note:
Added to blank page at end of volume; smudged and partly
                    illegible.
